title: Brussels Sprouts With Toasted Walnuts
summary: Brussels Sprouts With Toasted Walnuts might be just the side dish you are searching for. One serving contains 166 calories, 6g of protein, and 12g of fat. This recipe serves 4. For $1.21 per serving, this recipe covers 19% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A few people made this recipe, and 38 would say it hit the spot. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 15 minutes. A mixture of brussels sprouts, olive oil, lemon juice, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so yummy. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 86%. This score is spectacular. Similar recipes include Brussels Sprouts with Cranberries and Walnuts, Brussels Sprouts With Prosciutto and Walnuts, and Sauteed Brussels Sprouts With Walnuts.
